SA15dhkvadnu:00105_0: nigrahasthānam, anyat tu na yuktam iti na iṣyate //1//
SA15dhkvadnu:00106_0: iṣṭasya arthasya siddhiḥ sādhanam, tasya nirvartakam
SA15dhkvadnu:00107_0: aṅgam, tasya avacanam tasya aṅgasya anuccāraṇaṃ vādino
SA15dhkvadnu:00110_0: trividham eva hi liṅgam apratyakṣasya siddher aṅgam,
SA15dhkvadnu:00111_0: svabhāvaḥ kāryam anupalabdhaś ca. tasya samarthanaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:00113_0: yathā yat sat kṛtakam vā, tat sarvam anityam, yathā ghaṭa-ādiḥ,
SA15dhkvadnu:00114_0: san kṛtako vā śabda iti. atra api na kaścit krama-
SA15dhkvadnu:00115_0: niyamaḥ, iṣṭa-artha-siddher ubhayatra aviśeṣāt. dharmiṇi prāk
SA15dhkvadnu:00116_0: sattvaṃ prasādhya paścād api vyāptiḥ prasādhyata eva
SA15dhkvadnu:00117_0: yathā san śabdaḥ kṛtako vā, yaś ca evam, sa sarvo anityaḥ,
SA15dhkvadnu:00202_0: yadi na sarvaṃ sat kṛtakaṃ vā pratikṣaṇa-vināśi
SA15dhkvadnu:00204_0: arthakriyā-sāmarthya lakṣaṇato nivṛttam ity asad eva syāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:00207_0: virodha-abhāvād asya viparyaye vṛtter adarśane api
SA15dhkvadnu:00208_0: san kṛtako vā syān nityaś ca ity anivṛttir eva śaṅkāyāḥ. tato
SA15dhkvadnu:00210_0: na apy adarśana-mātrād vyāvṛttiḥ, viprakṛṣṭeṣv asarva-darśino
SA15dhkvadnu:00211_0: adarśanasya abhāva-asādhanāt, arvāgdarśanena satām api keṣāṃcid
SA15dhkvadnu:00214_0: na tasya kvacit sāmarthyam, asti ca akṣaṇike sa iti
SA15dhkvadnu:00216_0: yat sat kṛtakaṃ vā tad anityam eva iti sidhyati, tāvatā ca sādhana
SA15dhkvadnu:00301_0: eva asāmarthyena vyāpty-asiddheḥ pūrvakasya api hetor
SA15dhkvadnu:00302_0: avyāptiḥ. iha api punaḥ sādhana-upakrame anavasthā-prasaṅga
SA15dhkvadnu:00303_0: iti cet. na, abhāva sādhanasya adarśanasya apratiṣedhāt. yad
SA15dhkvadnu:00306_0: ucyate. evaṃ hi sa hetuḥ sādhya-abhāve asan sidhyet, yadi
SA15dhkvadnu:00307_0: tatra pramāṇavatā sva-viruddhena bādhyeta. anyathā tatra
SA15dhkvadnu:00308_0: asya bādhaka-asiddhau saṃśayo durnivāraḥ. na ca sarva-anupalabdhir
SA15dhkvadnu:00310_0: yogena vyāptaṃ siddham, prakāra-antara-abhāvāt. tena vyāpaka-
SA15dhkvadnu:00318_0: kāryahetāv api sādhana-aṅgasya samarthanam, yat kārya-
SA15dhkvadnu:00319_0: liṅgaṃ kāraṇasya sādhanāya upādīyate, tasya tena saha kāryakāraṇabhāva-
SA15dhkvadnu:00402_0: yathā idam asmin sati bhavati. satsv api tad-anyeṣu
SA15dhkvadnu:00403_0: samartheṣu tad-hetuṣu tad-abhāve na bhavati iti. evaṃ hy
SA15dhkvadnu:00405_0: anyathā kevalaṃ tad-abhāve na bhavati ity upadarśane
SA15dhkvadnu:00406_0: anyasya api tatra abhāve sandigdham asya sāmarthyam. anyat
SA15dhkvadnu:00407_0: tatra samartham, tad-abhāvāt tan na bhūtam. etan-nivṛttau
SA15dhkvadnu:00411_0: evaṃ samarthitaṃ tat tat-kāryaṃ sidhyati. siddhaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:00412_0: sat sva-sambhavena tat-sambhavaṃ sādhayati. kāryasya kāraṇa-
SA15dhkvadnu:00414_0: sadṛśo nyāyaḥ. evam asamarthanaṃ kāryahetāv api sādhana-
SA15dhkvadnu:00418_0: asiddheḥ, vastutaḥ kāryasya apy upādāne tad-apratipādanāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:00502_0: sākalyaṃ ca. svabhāva-viśeṣo yan na trividhena
SA15dhkvadnu:00506_0: viṣayaḥ. tato anyathā sati liṅge saṃśayaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:00507_0: atra api sarvam evaṃvidham asad-vyavahāra-viṣaya iti
SA15dhkvadnu:00508_0: vyāptiḥ, kasyacid asato abhyupagame tal-lakṣaṇa-aviśeṣāt; na
SA15dhkvadnu:00509_0: hy evaṃvidhasya asattvān abhyupagame anyatra tasya yogaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:00510_0: na hy evaṃvidhasya sataḥ satsv anyeṣu upalambha-kāraṇeṣv
SA15dhkvadnu:00511_0: anupalabdhiḥ. anupalabhyamāṇaṃ tv īdṛśaṃ na asti ity etāvanmātra-
SA15dhkvadnu:00514_0: sarva-sāmarthya-viveko nimittam iti cet, evam etat tasya eva
SA15dhkvadnu:00519_0: ca asad-vyavahāra iti cet, bhavati buddher yathokta-pratibhāsāyāḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:00521_0: pratyakṣa-aviṣaye tu syāl liṅgajāyā api kutaścit sad-vyavahāraḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:00601_0: na ca sarve buddhi-vyapadeśās tad-bheda-abhedau vā vastu-
SA15dhkvadnu:00602_0: sattāṃ vastu-bheda-abheda-sattāṃ vā sādhayanti, asatsv api
SA15dhkvadnu:00605_0: vṛtteḥ, rājā mahā-sammataḥ prabhavo rājavaṃśasya, śaṅkhaś
SA15dhkvadnu:00608_0: ghaṭaś ca iti. na hi sanidarśana-ādi śabdā nānā-vastu-viṣayā ekatra
SA15dhkvadnu:00610_0: nānā-viṣayatve apy ekatra upasaṃhāras tan-nimittānān tatra
SA15dhkvadnu:00611_0: samavāyād iti cet, āyāse vata ayaṃ tapasvī padārthaḥ patito
SA15dhkvadnu:00613_0: samāśaṃsan. sa yaiḥ śakti-bhedair anekaṃ sambandhinam
SA15dhkvadnu:00614_0: upakaroti tair eva anekaṃ śabdaṃ kiṃ na utthāpayati.
SA15dhkvadnu:00617_0: upakāro api mā bhūt, anupakāre hi teṣāṃ tat-sambandhitā
SA15dhkvadnu:00619_0: ghaṭa ity api ca rūpa-ādaya eva bahava eka-arthakriyākāriṇa
SA15dhkvadnu:00621_0: bahavo api hy eka-artha-kāriṇo bhaveyuś cakṣur-ādi-vat. tat-sāmarthya-
SA15dhkvadnu:00622_0: sthāpanāya tatra eka-śabda-niyogo api syād iti yuktaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:00623_0: paśyāmaḥ. na ca niḥprayojanā lokasya artheṣu śabda-yojanā.
SA15dhkvadnu:00624_0: tatra ye arthāḥ saha pṛthag vā eka-prayojanās teṣāṃ tadbhāva-
SA15dhkvadnu:00625_0: sthāpanāya hy eka-śabdo niyujyate yadi, kiṃ syāt. tad-arthakriyā-
SA15dhkvadnu:00702_0: vacana-virodho api na asty eva. sahitānāṃ sā śaktir ekā na
SA15dhkvadnu:00703_0: pratyekam iti samudāya-śabda ekasmin samudāye vācye
SA15dhkvadnu:00704_0: eka-vacanaṃ ghaṭa iti. jāti śabdeṣv arthānāṃ pratyekaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:00705_0: sahitānāṃ ca śakter nānā-ekā ca śaktir iti, nānā-eka-śakti-vivakṣāyāṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:00706_0: bahu-vacanam eka-vacanaṃ ca icchāto vṛkṣā vṛkṣa iti
SA15dhkvadnu:00707_0: syāt, yady eṣa niyamo bahuṣv eva bahu-vacanam, ekasminn
SA15dhkvadnu:00708_0: eka-vacanam iti. asmākan tu sāṃketikeṣv artheṣu saṃketa-
SA15dhkvadnu:00710_0: nānā-eko rūpa-ādir eka-śabda-utthāpane śakta iti cet, kiṃ vai
SA15dhkvadnu:00711_0: puruṣa-vṛtter anapekṣāḥ śabdān arthāḥ svayam utthāpayanti,
SA15dhkvadnu:00713_0: niyujyante. svayam utthāpane hi bhāva-śaktir aśaktir vā cintyeta,
SA15dhkvadnu:00714_0: na ca tad yuktam. puruṣais teṣāṃ niyoge yatheṣṭaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:00715_0: niyuñjīrann iti kas tatra upālambhaḥ, nimittaṃ ca niyogasya
SA15dhkvadnu:00716_0: uktam eva. api ca yadi na rūpa-ādīnām ekena śabdena sambandhaḥ,
SA15dhkvadnu:00718_0: sambandha iti kevalam ayam asad-bhūta-abhiniveśa eva.
SA15dhkvadnu:00719_0: na vayam eka-sambandha-virodhād ekaṃ śabdaṃ na icchāmaḥ,
SA15dhkvadnu:00720_0: api tv abhinnānāṃ rūpa-ādīnāṃ ghaṭa-kambala-ādiṣu nānā-
SA15dhkvadnu:00722_0: arthakriyām eva na kuryuḥ. tena tat-prakāśanāya ekaikena
SA15dhkvadnu:00723_0: api śabdena na ucyeran. bhavatu nāma kasyacid ayaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:00724_0: vāñcchā bhaveyur eka-rūpā rūpa-ādayaḥ sarva-samudāyeṣv iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:00726_0: enām upekṣate. aniṣṭaṃ ca idaṃ rūpa-ādīnāṃ pratisamudāyaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:00801_0: yady anya eva rūpa-ādibhyo ghaṭa iti ekaḥ syāt,
SA15dhkvadnu:00802_0: kiṃ syāt. astu, pratyakṣasya sato arūpa-ādi-rūpasya tad-vivekena buddhau
SA15dhkvadnu:00804_0: ca vivekena pratyakṣā arthā dṛśyante apṛthagdeśatve
SA15dhkvadnu:00806_0: api. idam eva ca pratyakṣasya pratyakṣatvam, yad
SA15dhkvadnu:00808_0: ayaṃ punar ghaṭo amūlya-dāna-krayī, yaḥ svarūpaṃ ca na upadarśayati
SA15dhkvadnu:00809_0: pratyakṣatāṃ ca svīkartum icchati. etena buddhi-
SA15dhkvadnu:00810_0: śabda-ādayo api vyākhyātā yadi tais tat-sādhanam iṣyate. na ca
SA15dhkvadnu:00812_0: liṅgam ucyate. apratyakṣatve apy apramāṇasya sattā-
SA15dhkvadnu:00813_0: upagamo na yuktaḥ. tan na rūpa-ādibhyo anyo ghaṭaḥ. evaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:00815_0: bheda-abheda-vyavahāro vā ata eva na tad-viparyayād viparyayaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:00817_0: arthakriyātas tu sattā-vyavahāraḥ syāt, na sattā-bheda-abheda-
SA15dhkvadnu:00821_0: na brūmo arthakriyā-bheda-mātreṇa sattā-bheda iti, kiṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:00822_0: tarhi adṛṣṭa-arthakriyā-bhedena. yā arthakriyā yasminn adṛṣṭā
SA15dhkvadnu:00823_0: punar dṛśyate sā sattā-bhedaṃ sādhayati, yathā mṛdy adṛṣṭā
SA15dhkvadnu:00824_0: saty udaka-dhāraṇa-ādy-arthakriyā ghaṭe dṛśyamānā, adṛṣṭā api
SA15dhkvadnu:00825_0: tantuṣu prāvaraṇa-ādy-arthakriyā paṭe dṛśyata iti sattā-
SA15dhkvadnu:00901_0: sidhyati evam artha-antaram, tathā apy avayavī na sidhyati.
SA15dhkvadnu:00908_0: viparyayād viparyaya iti satyam etat. sa eva tu viparyayo
SA15dhkvadnu:00909_0: anupalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāpteṣu na sidhyati. tatra punar idam
SA15dhkvadnu:00910_0: anicchato apy āyātam, yasya idaṃ sāmarthyam upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-
SA15dhkvadnu:00911_0: prāptaṃ san na upalabhyate, so asad-vyavahāra-viṣayaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:00912_0: sāmarthya-lakṣaṇatvāt sattvasya iti. tathā api ko atiśayaḥ pūrvakād
SA15dhkvadnu:00913_0: asya. na hi svabhāvād artha-antaraṃ sāmarthyam, tasya
SA15dhkvadnu:00915_0: eva iti pūrvakā eva iyam anupalabdhiḥ. tasmād anena kvacit
SA15dhkvadnu:00917_0: abhyupagantavyo na vā kvacid viśeṣa-abhāvāt. so
SA15dhkvadnu:00918_0: anyatra api tathāvidhe aviśiṣṭa iti so api tathā astv iti vyāptiḥ:
SA15dhkvadnu:00920_0: na eva kaścit kvacit kathaṃcid anupalabdho apy asad-vyavahāra-
SA15dhkvadnu:00921_0: viṣaya iti cet, sarvasya sarva-rūpāṇāṃ sarvadā anivṛtteḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:00922_0: sarvaṃ sarvatra sarvadā samupayujyeta. idaṃ ca na
SA15dhkvadnu:00923_0: syāt: idam ataḥ, nāta idam, iha idam, iha na idam, idānīm
SA15dhkvadnu:00924_0: idam, idānīṃ na idam, idam evam, idaṃ na evam iti, kasyacid
SA15dhkvadnu:00925_0: api rūpasya kathaṃcid kvacit kadācid viveka-hetor abhāvāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:01002_0: ta eva sarva-viṣayasya asad-vyavahārasya abhāvān na sambhavanti,
SA15dhkvadnu:01003_0: yatas tebhyo vyavasthā syāt. kvacid viṣaye asad-vyavahāra-
SA15dhkvadnu:01004_0: upagame sa kuta iti vaktavyam. na hy anupalambhād
SA15dhkvadnu:01007_0: eva tad-abhyupagame sa yatra eva asti sarvo asad-vyavahāra-
SA15dhkvadnu:01009_0: sarva-pramāṇa-nivṛttir anupalabdhiḥ. sā yatra so asad-viṣaya
SA15dhkvadnu:01010_0: iṣṭa iti cet, sukumāra-prajño devānāṃpriyo na sahate
SA15dhkvadnu:01011_0: pramāṇa-cintā-vyavahāra-parikleśaṃ yena na atra ādaraṃ kṛtavān.
SA15dhkvadnu:01012_0: na hy anumāna-ādi-nivṛttir abhāvaṃ gamayati vyabhicārāt,
SA15dhkvadnu:01014_0: nivṛttir api viprakṛṣṭeṣu. tasmāt svabhāva-viśeṣo yataḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:01017_0: pramāṇa-sattayā vyāpteḥ. na ca upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptasya arthasya
SA15dhkvadnu:01018_0: pratyakṣād anya-upalabdhir yena anumānād asya upalabdhiḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:01019_0: syāt. na ca tad-rūpa-anyathābhāvam antareṇa apratyakṣatā-
SA15dhkvadnu:01020_0: anyathābhāve ca tad eva na syāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:01021_0: api ca kuta idam amantra-oṣadham indrajālaṃ bhāvena
SA15dhkvadnu:01101_0: sthānas tasya eva tad-avasthā indriya-āder eva puruṣasya kadācit
SA15dhkvadnu:01102_0: pratyakṣo apratyakṣaś ca, yena kadācit asya anumānam upalabdhiḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:01103_0: kadācit pratyakṣaṃ kadācid āgamaḥ, etasminn eva anatiśaye
SA15dhkvadnu:01105_0: na anatiśaya eka-atiśaya-nivṛttyā apara-atiśaya-utpattyā ca vyavahāra-
SA15dhkvadnu:01106_0: bheda-upagamāt. so atiśayas tasya ātmabhūto ananvayo nivartamānaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:01108_0: ākarṣayati sukha-duḥkha-vat. sānvayatve ca kā kasya
SA15dhkvadnu:01109_0: pravṛttir nivṛttir vā iti yat kiṃcid etat.
SA15dhkvadnu:01110_0: athavā yadi kasyacit svabhāvasya pravṛtti-nivṛttī svayam
SA15dhkvadnu:01111_0: abhyanujñāyete, tad eva paro bruvāṇaḥ kim iti na anumanyate.
SA15dhkvadnu:01113_0: ayam anvayo nāma bhāvasya janma-vināśayoḥ. śaktiḥ, sā asty
SA15dhkvadnu:01114_0: eva prāg api janmano nirodhād apy ūrdhvam. tena ayaṃ na apūrvaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:01115_0: sarvathā jāyate, na pūrvo vināśyati iti. yadi sā sarvadā anatiśayā
SA15dhkvadnu:01116_0: kim idānīm atiśayavat yat kṛto ayaṃ vyavahāra-vibhāgaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:01117_0: tā avasthā atiśayavatya iti cet tā avasthāḥ sā ca
SA15dhkvadnu:01118_0: śaktiḥ, kim eko bhāva āhosvin nānā. ekaś cet, katham idānīm
SA15dhkvadnu:01120_0: yokṣyate: janma-ajanma nivṛttir anivṛttir ekatvaṃ nānātvaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:01201_0: asti paryāyo avasthā śaktir iti tena avirodha iti cet, vismaraṇa-
SA15dhkvadnu:01202_0: śīlo devānāṃpriyaḥ prakaraṇaṃ na lakṣayati. śaktir
SA15dhkvadnu:01203_0: avasthā ity eko bhāvo avibhāga iti pakṣe ayaṃ virodha uktaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:01204_0: atha asty anayor vibhāgo na kaścid virodhaḥ, kevalaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:01205_0: sānvayau bhāvasya janma-vināśāv iti na syāt, yasmād yasya anvayo
SA15dhkvadnu:01206_0: na tasya janma-vināśau yasya ca tau na tasya anvayaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:01207_0: tayor abhedād adoṣa iti cet, anuttaraṃ bata, doṣa-saṅkaṭam
SA15dhkvadnu:01208_0: atrabhavān dṛṣṭi-rāgeṇa praveśyamāno api na ātmānaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:01209_0: cetayati. abhedo hi nāma-aikyaṃ tāv iti ca bheda-adhiṣṭhāno
SA15dhkvadnu:01211_0: sthitāv, asthitir ity ādikaṃ nānātva-lakṣaṇaṃ ca
SA15dhkvadnu:01212_0: kathaṃ yojyate. eṣa hi bhāvānāṃ bheda etad-virahaś ca abhedo
SA15dhkvadnu:01213_0: yathā sukha-ādiṣu śakty- avasthayoś ca ekātmani. anyathā
SA15dhkvadnu:01216_0: tadātmani prādurbhāvo abhedaḥ, viparyaye bhedaḥ, yathā
SA15dhkvadnu:01218_0: bhedaś ca viparyaye sukha-duḥkhayor iti, idaṃ bheda-
SA15dhkvadnu:01219_0: abheda-lakṣaṇam, tena avirodha iti cet, na vai mṛdātmani
SA15dhkvadnu:01220_0: ghaṭasya prādurbhāvaḥ, kiṃ tarhi mṛdātmā eva kaścit
SA15dhkvadnu:01221_0: ghaṭaḥ. na hy ekas trailokye mṛd-ātmā, prativijñapti-pratibhāsa-
SA15dhkvadnu:01222_0: bhedāt dravya-svabhāva-bhedāt. evaṃ hy asya api sukha-ādiṣu
SA15dhkvadnu:01223_0: caitanyeṣu ca bheda-avagamaḥ samartho bhavati, yady
SA15dhkvadnu:01301_0: saty apy etasmin kasyacid ātmano anvayād aikyam iti
SA15dhkvadnu:01302_0: cet, sukha-ādiṣv apy ayaṃ prasaṅgaḥ caitanyeṣu ca. na ca ghaṭa-
SA15dhkvadnu:01304_0: na ca ghaṭaṃ mṛd-ātmānaṃ ca kaścid vivekena upalakṣayati.
SA15dhkvadnu:01305_0: yena evaṃ syād idam iha prādurbhūtam iti. na hy
SA15dhkvadnu:01307_0: na ca śakteḥ śakty-ātmani prādurbhāva iti tasyāḥ svātmano
SA15dhkvadnu:01309_0: etena pariṇāmaḥ pratyuktaḥ, yo api hi kalpayet, yo yasya
SA15dhkvadnu:01310_0: pariṇāmaḥ, sa tasmād abhinna iti, na hi śakter ātma-apariṇāma
SA15dhkvadnu:01311_0: iti, kiṃ ca idam uktaṃ bhavati pariṇāma iti. avasthitasya
SA15dhkvadnu:01313_0: ca pariṇāmaḥ yat tad dharma-antaraṃ nivartate
SA15dhkvadnu:01314_0: prādurbhavati ca, kiṃ tat tad eva avasthitaṃ dravyaṃ syāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:01316_0: yadi tat tad eva, tasya avasthānaṃ na nivṛtti-prādurbhāvāv
SA15dhkvadnu:01317_0: iti kasya tāv iti vaktavyam. avasthitasya dharma-antaram iti
SA15dhkvadnu:01318_0: ca na sidhyati. na hi tad eva tasya anapāśrita-vyapekṣa-abhedaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:01320_0: atha dravyād artha-antaraṃ dharmaḥ, tadā tasya nivṛtti-
SA15dhkvadnu:01321_0: prādurbhāvābhyāṃ na dravyasya pariṇatiḥ. na hy artha-antaragatābhyāṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:01401_0: dravyasya dharma iti ca vyapadeśo na sidhyati sambandha-
SA15dhkvadnu:01402_0: abhāvāt. na hi kāryakāraṇabhāvād anyo vastu-sambandho
SA15dhkvadnu:01403_0: asti. na ca anayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ, svayam atadātmano
SA15dhkvadnu:01407_0: kāryasya utpādanād dravyasya pariṇāma iti iṣṭaṃ syāt. tad aviruddham
SA15dhkvadnu:01410_0: kāryasya utpattau mṛd-dravyaṃ pariṇatam iti vyavahārasya upagamāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:01411_0: na ca dharmasya dravyāt tattvānyatvābhyām anyo
SA15dhkvadnu:01412_0: vikalpaḥ sambhavati, ubhayathā api na pariṇāmaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:01413_0: na nirvivekaṃ dravyam eva dharmaḥ, na api dravyād
SA15dhkvadnu:01414_0: artha-antaram, kiṃ tarhi, dravyasya saṃniveśo avasthā-antaram,
SA15dhkvadnu:01415_0: yathā aṅgulīnāṃ muṣṭiḥ. na hy aṅguly eva nirvivekā muṣṭiḥ,
SA15dhkvadnu:01416_0: prasāritānām amuṣṭitvāt, na apy artha-antaram, pṛthak-svabhāvena
SA15dhkvadnu:01417_0: anupalabdher iti cet, na, muṣṭer aṅguli-viśeṣatvāt. aṅgulya
SA15dhkvadnu:01418_0: eva hi kāścin muṣṭiḥ, na sarvāḥ. na hi prasāritā aṅgulyo
SA15dhkvadnu:01420_0: pratipatti-prasaṅgāt. ya eva hi khalu vivekaḥ svabhāvabhūtaḥ,
SA15dhkvadnu:01501_0: ca viveka-utpāde aṅgulyaḥ prasāritā eva upalabhyeran, na hi
SA15dhkvadnu:01504_0: nanu uktaṃ na dravyam eva nirvivekam avasthā, na api
SA15dhkvadnu:01505_0: dravyād artha-antaram iti. uktam idam, na punar yuktam, na
SA15dhkvadnu:01506_0: hi sato vastunas tattvānyatve muktvā anyaḥ prakāraḥ sambhavanti,
SA15dhkvadnu:01509_0: pratikṣaṇa-vināśinīṣv anyā eva prasāritāḥ, anyā muṣṭiḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:01511_0: viṣayaḥ, bīja-aṅkura-ādi-śabda-vat vrīhy-ādi-śabda-vac ca. tena aṅgulyaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:01513_0: tad yadi prāg asad eva kāraṇe kāryaṃ bhavet, kiṃ na
SA15dhkvadnu:01514_0: sarvaḥ sarvasmād bhavati. na hy asattve kaścid viśeṣa iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:01515_0: nanu sarvatra sarvasya sattve apy ayaṃ tulyo doṣaḥ. na hi
SA15dhkvadnu:01516_0: sattve kaścid viśeṣaḥ. viśeṣe vā sa viśeṣas traiguṇyād
SA15dhkvadnu:01517_0: bhinnaḥ syāt, tadbhāve viśeṣasya ananvayāt. sataś ca sarvātmanā
SA15dhkvadnu:01519_0: ca, sādhyasya kasyacid abhāvāt yasya kasyacid atiśayasya
SA15dhkvadnu:01520_0: tatra kathaṃcid asata utpattau, so atiśayas tatra asan
SA15dhkvadnu:01521_0: kathaṃ jāyate. jātau vā sarvaḥ sarvasmāj jāyeta iti tulyaḥ paryanuyogaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:01601_0: na atiśayas tatra sarvathā na asti, kathaṃcit sata eva bhāvād
SA15dhkvadnu:01602_0: iti cet, yathā na asti, sa prakāras tatra asan kathaṃ jāyeta.
SA15dhkvadnu:01603_0: na ca sarvathā sataḥ kaścij janma-artha ity uktam.
SA15dhkvadnu:01604_0: asato api kāryasya kāraṇād utpāde, yo yaj-janana-svabhāvaḥ,
SA15dhkvadnu:01605_0: tata eva tasya janma, na anyasmād iti niyamaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:01606_0: tasya api sa svabhāva-niyamaḥ sva-hetor ity anādi-bhāva-svabhāva-
SA15dhkvadnu:01608_0: api ca, yadi mṛt-piṇḍe ghaṭo asti, kathaṃ tad-avasthāyāṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:01609_0: na paścād-vad upalabdhiḥ, tad-arthakriyā vā. vyakter aprādurbhāvād
SA15dhkvadnu:01610_0: iti cet, tasya eva tad-arthakriyā-ādi-bhāve ghaṭatvāt,
SA15dhkvadnu:01611_0: tad-rūpasya ca prāg asattvāt, kathaṃ ghaṭo asti. na hi rūpa-antarasya
SA15dhkvadnu:01612_0: sattve rūpa-antaram asti. na ca rūpa-pratibhāsa-bhede vastv-
SA15dhkvadnu:01615_0: sa na asty eva. na hi tasya tat-svabhāva-sthitāv anupalabdhiḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:01626_0: viruddha-upalabdhiṣv api dvayor viruddhayor ekasya viruddhasya
SA15dhkvadnu:01704_0: athavā sādhyate tena pareṣām apratīto artha iti sādhanaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:01706_0: ādi-vacanam. tasya ekasya apy avacanam asādhana-aṅga-vacanam.
SA15dhkvadnu:01707_0: tad api vādino nigrahasthānam tad-avacane hetu-rūpasya
SA15dhkvadnu:01709_0: athavā tasya eva sādhanasya yan na aṅgaṃ pratijñā-upanaya-
SA15dhkvadnu:01713_0: ca sādhana-prayoga ekasya eva abhidhānena siddher bhāvāt,
SA15dhkvadnu:01714_0: dvitīyasya asāmarthyam iti tasya apy asādhana-aṅgasya abhidhānaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:01717_0: apy upadeyam eva. na, vaiyarthyāt. asaty api pratijñā-
SA15dhkvadnu:01718_0: vacane yathoktāt sādhana-vākyād bhavaty eva iṣṭa-artha-siddhir
SA15dhkvadnu:01719_0: ity apārthakaṃ tasya upādānam. yadi ca viṣaya-upadarśanam
SA15dhkvadnu:01720_0: antareṇa pratīter anutpattiḥ, kathaṃ na pratijñā sādhana-
SA15dhkvadnu:01721_0: avayavaḥ. na hi pakṣa-dharma-ādi-vacanasya api pratīti-hetu-
SA15dhkvadnu:01722_0: bhāvād anyaḥ sādhana-arthaḥ. sa pratijñā-vacane api tulya iti
SA15dhkvadnu:01801_0: kevalasya asāmarthyād asādhanatvam iti cet, tat tulyaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:01802_0: pakṣa-dharma-vacanasya api iti tad api na sādhana-avayavaḥ syāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:01803_0: na hi pakṣa-dharma-vacanāt kevalāt pratipatter utpattiḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:01808_0: athavā sādhanasya siddher yan na aṅgam asiddho viruddho
SA15dhkvadnu:01809_0: anaikāntiko vā hetvābhāsaḥ. tasya api vacanaṃ vādino
SA15dhkvadnu:01812_0: dṛṣṭāntābhāsasya asādhana-aṅgasya vacanam api vādino nigrahasthānam,
SA15dhkvadnu:01813_0: asamartha-upādānād eva. na hi tair hetoḥ sambandhaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:01816_0: athavā siddhiḥ sādhanam tad-aṅgaṃ dharmo yasya arthasya
SA15dhkvadnu:01818_0: tad-vyatirekeṇa aparasya apy ajijñāsitasya viśeṣasya śāstra-āśraya-
SA15dhkvadnu:01904_0: yeṣa panna-ādinā bahiḥ prativādinaḥ prāśnikānāṃ ca
SA15dhkvadnu:01905_0: nyāyadarśinām iti. ebhiḥ kathā-viccheda eva karaṇīyaḥ, na
SA15dhkvadnu:01906_0: hi kaścid arthaḥ kvacit kriyamāṇa-prasaṅge na prayujyate,
SA15dhkvadnu:01907_0: nairātmyavādinas tu tat-sādhane nṛtya-gīty-āder api tatra
SA15dhkvadnu:01909_0: yathā pratijñā-abhidhāna-pūrvakaṃ kaścit kuryāt. na asty
SA15dhkvadnu:01910_0: ātmā iti vayaṃ bauddhā brūmaḥ. ke bauddhāḥ. ye buddhasya
SA15dhkvadnu:01911_0: bhagavataḥ śāsanam abhyupagatāḥ. ko buddho bhagavān.
SA15dhkvadnu:01912_0: yasya śāsane bhadanta-aśvaghoṣaḥ pravrajitaḥ. kaḥ punar
SA15dhkvadnu:01914_0: kīdṛśaṃ rāṣṭra-pālaṃ nāma nāṭakam iti prasaṅgaṃ kṛtvā
SA15dhkvadnu:01915_0: nāndyante tataḥ praviśati sūtradhāra iti paṭhen nṛtyed
SA15dhkvadnu:01916_0: gāyec ca. prativādī taṃ ca sarva-prasaṅgaṃ na anukartuṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:01919_0: na ca evaṃ prastutasya paryavasānaṃ sambhavati, aniścaya-
SA15dhkvadnu:02001_0: kathaṃ ca evaṃ jaya-parājayau, prativādino apy ananubhāṣaṇasya
SA15dhkvadnu:02003_0: vyājena sambhavād aniścitatvāc ca. tasmāt pratijñā-vacanam
SA15dhkvadnu:02004_0: eva tāvan na nyāyyam. kutaḥ punar tatra ajijñāsita-
SA15dhkvadnu:02006_0: ca. sarvaś ca ayaṃ prakāro durmatibhiḥ śaṭhair nyāya-sāmarthyena
SA15dhkvadnu:02010_0: ghoṣaṇam, nityaḥ śabdo anityo vā iti vāde dvādaśa-lakṣaṇa-
SA15dhkvadnu:02018_0: iti cet, anyasya apy ajijñāsitasya kiṃ na bhavati. na hi
SA15dhkvadnu:02021_0: ādi-siddhim antareṇa na anityatā-siddhiḥ, tathāvidhas tu
SA15dhkvadnu:02022_0: dharmaḥ pṛthag anukto api sādhya-dharme antarbhāvāt pakṣīkṛta
SA15dhkvadnu:02023_0: eva iti na pṛthag asya upanyāso vyākhyānaṃ vā. tasmād
SA15dhkvadnu:02101_0: evaṃvidhasya api tadānīṃ prativādinā ajijñāsitasya arthasya
SA15dhkvadnu:02102_0: pratijñāyām anyatra vā upanyāso vyākhyānaṃ vā artha-antara-
SA15dhkvadnu:02104_0: eva sādhana-aṅgaṃ vācyam. na prasaṅga upakṣeptavyaḥ,
SA15dhkvadnu:02107_0: tathābhāve pratipādite, anyathā dvayor ekasya api
SA15dhkvadnu:02110_0: sādhane prayukte abhyupagata-uttara-pakṣo yatra viṣaye prativādī
SA15dhkvadnu:02111_0: yadā na doṣam udbhāvayati tadā parājito vaktavyaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:02114_0: aṣṭādaśa dṛṣṭānta-doṣaś ca. teṣām anudbhāvanam apratyāyanam
SA15dhkvadnu:02116_0: tat punaḥ sādhanasya nirdoṣatvāt, sadoṣatve api prativādino
SA15dhkvadnu:02117_0: ajñānāt pratipādana-asāmarthyād vā. na hi duṣṭa-sādhana-abhidhāne
SA15dhkvadnu:02118_0: api vādinaḥ prativādino apratipādite doṣe parājaya-
SA15dhkvadnu:02121_0: bhūta-pratipatter abhāvād apratipādakasya jayo api na asty
SA15dhkvadnu:02122_0: eva. na hi tattva-cintāyāṃ kaścic chala-vyavahāraḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:02201_0: yady evaṃ kiṃ na parājayaḥ, tattva-siddhi-bhraṃśāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:02202_0: na anirākaraṇāt. nirākaraṇaṃ hi tasya anyena parājayaḥ, na
SA15dhkvadnu:02204_0: sādhana-abhāve asaty api pratiyogini bhāvāt. pratiyoginaś ca
SA15dhkvadnu:02208_0: chala-vyavahāre api vijigīṣūṇāṃ vāda iti cet, na, durjana-
SA15dhkvadnu:02209_0: vipratipatty-adhikāre satāṃ śāstra-pravṛtteḥ. na hi para-anugraha-
SA15dhkvadnu:02211_0: ādīn asad-vyavahārān upadiśanti. na ca para-vipaṃsanena
SA15dhkvadnu:02212_0: lābha-satkāra-śloka-upārjanaṃ satām ācāraḥ. na api tathā-pravṛttebhyaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:02215_0: sadbhir lābha-ādy-upārjanāya praṇīyante. tasmān na yoga-vihitaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:02216_0: kaścid vijigīṣu-vādo nāma. para-anugraha-pravṛttās tu santo
SA15dhkvadnu:02219_0: tasya eva anuprabodhāya. tad eva nyāya-anusaraṇaṃ satāṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:02220_0: vādaḥ, ukta-nyāye tattva-arthī cet pratipadyeta, tad-apratipattāv
SA15dhkvadnu:02224_0: api iti vaktavyam. tasmān na jyāyān ayaṃ tattva-rakṣaṇa-
SA15dhkvadnu:02303_0: para-upatāpa-vidhāne api tattva-apratiṣṭhāpanāt. anyathā api nyāya-
SA15dhkvadnu:02307_0: athavā yo na doṣaḥ sādhanasya tad-bhāve api vādinā sādhayitum
SA15dhkvadnu:02308_0: iṣṭasya arthasya siddher vighāta-abhāvāt, tasya udbhāvanaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:02311_0: yathā sādhyatayā aniṣṭo api vādino dharmaḥ, śāstra-upagamāt
SA15dhkvadnu:02312_0: sādhya iti tad-viparyāsena virodha-udbhāvanam. na asty
SA15dhkvadnu:02313_0: ātmā iti tava pratijñā-padayor virodha iti pratijñā-doṣa-udbhāvanam.
SA15dhkvadnu:02317_0: jāty-uttarāṇi ity evam-āder doṣasya udbhāvanam adoṣa-udbhāvanam.
SA15dhkvadnu:02319_0: tasya vādinā doṣa-ābhāsatve prakhyāpite prativādī parājito
SA15dhkvadnu:02321_0: punaḥ sādhane na dvayor ekasya api jaya-parājayau, tattva-
SA15dhkvadnu:02401_0: tasmāj jigīṣatā sva-pakṣaś ca sthāpanīyaḥ para-pakṣaś ca
SA15dhkvadnu:02402_0: nirākartavyaḥ. nirdoṣe sādhana-abhidhāne api vādinaḥ prativādinā
SA15dhkvadnu:02404_0: jaya-parājayau, na anyathā, bhāvatas tattva-abhidhāne api pratipakṣa-
SA15dhkvadnu:02406_0: prativādino apy atra, bhāvato mithyā-pratipatter iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:02501_0: anyat tu na yuktam iti na iṣyate.
SA15dhkvadnu:02502_0: yatra idaṃ yathoktaṃ nigrahasthāna-lakṣaṇaṃ na asti tasya
SA15dhkvadnu:02503_0: nigrahasthānatvam ayuktam iti na uktam asmābhiḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:02505_0: nigrahasthānam iti atra bhāṣyakāra-mataṃ dūṣayitvā vārttikakāro
SA15dhkvadnu:02506_0: ayaṃ sthita-pakṣam āha. tam eva brūmaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:02507_0: pratidṛṣṭāntasya yo dharmas taṃ yadā sva-dṛṣṭānte
SA15dhkvadnu:02508_0: abhyanujānāti nigṛhīto veditavyaḥ. tatra dṛṣṭaś ca asāv ante ca
SA15dhkvadnu:02509_0: vyavasthita iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ. sva-dṛṣṭāntaḥ sva-pakṣaḥ, pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:02511_0: abhyanujānan parājitaḥ, yathā anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād
SA15dhkvadnu:02512_0: iti brūvan pratipakṣa-vādini sāmānyena pratyavasthite āha
SA15dhkvadnu:02513_0: yadi sāmānyam aindriyakaṃ nityaṃ śabdo apy evam astv iti
SA15dhkvadnu:02517_0: kiṃ kṛto anena prakāreṇa pratijñāṃ tyajataḥ pratijñāhānir
SA15dhkvadnu:02518_0: iti. sambhavati hy anyena api prakāreṇa hetu-doṣa-udbhāvana-
SA15dhkvadnu:02520_0: para-pakṣa-upagamaś ca. idam eva ca pratijñāhāneḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:02521_0: pradhānaṃ nimittam evaṃ pratipāditena pratijñā hātavyā
SA15dhkvadnu:02601_0: idaṃ punar asambaddham eva sāmānyaṃ nityam aindriyakam
SA15dhkvadnu:02602_0: ity ukte śabdo apy evam astv iti. kaḥ svastha-ātmā svayam
SA15dhkvadnu:02603_0: aindriyakatvād anityaḥ śabdo ghaṭavad iti bruvan sāmānyena
SA15dhkvadnu:02605_0: sāmānyasya api nityasya aindriyakatve apy anitye ghaṭe darśanāt
SA15dhkvadnu:02607_0: jāḍyāt pratipadyeta api iti cet, tathā api kiṃ sāmānyasya upadarśanena.
SA15dhkvadnu:02608_0: evam eva nityaḥ śabda iti vaktavyaṃ jaḍasya
SA15dhkvadnu:02610_0: na ca nitya-sāmānya-upadarśanena tad-dharmaṃ śabde pratipadyamāne
SA15dhkvadnu:02612_0: śabda iti ca vadato nityaḥ śabda ity āñjasaḥ pratipakṣaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:02618_0: pratijñā-antaram pratijñāto artho anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād
SA15dhkvadnu:02702_0: ghaṭo asarvagato anitya eva śabdo apy asarvagato anitya
SA15dhkvadnu:02703_0: iti. etat pratijñā-antaraṃ nāma nigrahasthānaṃ sādhana-sāmarthye
SA15dhkvadnu:02704_0: apy aparijñānāt. sa hi pūrvasyā anityaḥ śabda iti
SA15dhkvadnu:02705_0: pratijñāyāḥ sādhanāya uttarām asarvagataḥ śabda iti pratijñām
SA15dhkvadnu:02706_0: āha. tad-darśanāya tad-artha-nirdeśa ity āha. tad-arthaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:02708_0: nirdeśaḥ. na ca pratijñā pratijñā-antara-sādhane samarthā
SA15dhkvadnu:02710_0: atra api na evam-bruvatā pratijñā-antaraṃ pūrva-pratijñā-sādhanāya
SA15dhkvadnu:02711_0: uktaṃ bhavati, kiṃ tarhi viśeṣaṇam aindriyakatvasya
SA15dhkvadnu:02712_0: hetoḥ sāmānye vṛttyā vyabhicāra udbhāvite asarvagatatve
SA15dhkvadnu:02714_0: pariharati. na punaḥ pratijñā-antaram āha, asarvagatatvasya
SA15dhkvadnu:02717_0: yad apy uktaṃ pūrva-pratijñā-sādhanāya uttarāṃ pratijñām
SA15dhkvadnu:02718_0: āha iti tad apy ayuktam. na hi pratijñā pratijñā-sādhanāya
SA15dhkvadnu:02719_0: ucyamānā pratijñā-antaraṃ bhavati, kiṃ tarhi hetv-āder ananyatamaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:02801_0: syān na sādhya-nirdeśaḥ. udāharaṇa-sādharmya-ādeś ca hetu-lakṣaṇasya
SA15dhkvadnu:02802_0: asarvagatve bhāvāt pratijñā-lakṣaṇasya ca abhāvāt, hetutvam
SA15dhkvadnu:02804_0: asambaddhaṃ ca idaṃ pratijñāṃ pratijñā-sādhanāya āha iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:02805_0: yo hi prāk pratijñām uktvā hetu-udāharaṇa-ādikaṃ vaktuṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:02806_0: jānāti, sa kiṃcid anukramaṃ sādhanasya jānāty eva hi, jānan
SA15dhkvadnu:02808_0: upādadīta. upādadatā ca anena pratijñā-mātreṇa siddhir
SA15dhkvadnu:02809_0: iṣṭā bhavati, tataś ca na prāg api hetuṃ brūyāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:02811_0: aśakyatvāt, lakṣaṇa-niyamo apy asambaddha eva pratijñā-
SA15dhkvadnu:02814_0: ekam eva lakṣaṇaṃ vācyaṃ syāt. na ca evaṃvidhaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:02815_0: kaścid vivādeṣu dṛṣṭa-pūrvo vyavahāro yena tad-arthaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:02816_0: yatnaḥ kriyate. na ca bāla-pralāpa-anudiśya śāstraṃ pravartate
SA15dhkvadnu:02817_0: pravṛttau ca kā niṣṭhā teṣām aniṣṭānāt. dṛśyate ca
SA15dhkvadnu:02818_0: viduṣām api na atinirūpaṇād asiddha-abhidhānam iti. vyavahāra-
SA15dhkvadnu:02901_0: tasmād iha api yadi nivṛtta-ākāṅkṣe vādini paro anaikāntikatām
SA15dhkvadnu:02903_0: nigrahasthānaṃ vādinaḥ, evaṃ yadi prativādī sat sāmānyam
SA15dhkvadnu:02906_0: eṣām arthānām apratipādane na bhūta-doṣa-udbhāvanam iti
SA15dhkvadnu:02907_0: na kaścit parājayo abhyupagama-mātreṇa vastu-siddher abhāvāt
SA15dhkvadnu:02909_0: sādhana-abhidhānāt tu jetā api na bhavati iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:02910_0: anitya-ākāṅkṣe punar vādini na kaścid doṣo viśeṣaṇa-abhidhānena
SA15dhkvadnu:02913_0: dravyam iti pratijñā, rūpa-ādibhyo artha-antarasya anupalabdher
SA15dhkvadnu:02914_0: iti hetuḥ, so ayaṃ pratijñā-hetvor virodhaḥ. etena
SA15dhkvadnu:02915_0: eva pratijñā-virodho apy ukto yatra pratijñā sva-vacanena
SA15dhkvadnu:02916_0: virudhyate, yathā śramaṇā garbhiṇī, na asty ātmā iti vā, hetu-
SA15dhkvadnu:02917_0: virodho api yatra pratijñayā hetur virudhyate, yathā sarvaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:02918_0: pṛthak samūhe bhāva-śabda-prayogād iti. etena pratijñayā
SA15dhkvadnu:02919_0: dṛṣṭānta-virodho api vyākhyātaḥ. hetoś ca dṛṣṭānta-ādibhir
SA15dhkvadnu:03002_0: virodhaḥ, yaḥ para-pakṣaṃ sva-siddhena gotva-ādinā vyabhicārayati,
SA15dhkvadnu:03004_0: ca, yaś ca sva-pakṣa-anapekṣaṃ hetuṃ prayuṅkte
SA15dhkvadnu:03005_0: anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād iti, tasya sva-siddhasya gotva-āder
SA15dhkvadnu:03010_0: tad-āśrayas tat-kṛto vā hetu-dṛṣṭāntayor na virodha iti na pratijñā-
SA15dhkvadnu:03012_0: syād etat, asaty api pratijñā-prayoge gamyamāno api pratijñā-
SA15dhkvadnu:03013_0: hetvor virodho bhavati, yathā rūpa-ādibhyo artha-antarasya anupalabdhiḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:03014_0: tad guṇa-vyatiriktam, na upalabhyate ca rūpa-ādibhyo
SA15dhkvadnu:03015_0: artha-antaraṃ dravyam ity ukte api gamyata eva sādhya-
SA15dhkvadnu:03018_0: satyam, syād ayaṃ virodhaḥ, yadi hetuḥ sādhya-dharma-
SA15dhkvadnu:03103_0: pratibhāsa-anupalabdhiḥ, tat tad-vyatirekeṇa na asti iti iṣṭa-vyatireka-
SA15dhkvadnu:03104_0: viparyaya-sādhanād viruddho hetur asmābhir ukta eva iti
SA15dhkvadnu:03105_0: bhavaty eva idaṃ nigraha-adhikaraṇam, yady evaṃvidhaḥ pratijñā-
SA15dhkvadnu:03106_0: hetvor virodha iṣṭaḥ. atha punar asya upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-
SA15dhkvadnu:03107_0: prāptir lupyate, tadā na kaścit pratijñā-hetvor virodhaḥ,
SA15dhkvadnu:03108_0: vyatiriktānām api bhāvānāṃ kutaścid viprakarṣiṇāṃ tad-
SA15dhkvadnu:03111_0: iti tatra idam eva nigraha-adhikaraṇam asādhana-aṅga-
SA15dhkvadnu:03112_0: bhūtāyāḥ pratijñāyāḥ sādhana-vākye prayogaḥ; na virodhaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:03113_0: tad-adhikaraṇatvāt. yadi pratijñā-anapekṣo virodhaḥ syāt, syāt
SA15dhkvadnu:03117_0: ye tu kecid vicāra-prasaṅgeṣv ekatra sādhye bahavo
SA15dhkvadnu:03119_0: vṛtteḥ sāmarthyam anyathā dvitīyasya vaiyarthyāt. yadi hi
SA15dhkvadnu:03120_0: tatra apy eka-prayogam antareṇa aparasya prayogo na sambhavet,
SA15dhkvadnu:03121_0: na tadā dvitīyasya kaścit sādhana-arthaḥ pratīta-pratipādana-
SA15dhkvadnu:03122_0: abhāvāt. tasmān na pratijñāyāḥ sva-vacana-virodho nāma
SA15dhkvadnu:03201_0: na ca na asty ātmā ity atra kaścit pratijñā-virodhaḥ na asty ātma-
SA15dhkvadnu:03203_0: hi virodhaḥ syāt. na ca sva-lakṣaṇaṃ śabdārtha iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:03204_0: yaḥ punaḥ pratijñayā bādhanād hetu-virodha uktaḥ, yathā
SA15dhkvadnu:03205_0: sarvaṃ pṛthak samūhe bhāva-śabda-prayogād iti, na atra
SA15dhkvadnu:03206_0: pratijñāyāḥ prayogaḥ, na api hetor, yena virodhaḥ syāt, kiṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:03213_0: iti brūyāt. etena tad-virodhaḥ pratyuktaḥ. dṛṣṭānta-upadarśanaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:03214_0: ca etad anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka-anityatvād iti yathā. kvacid
SA15dhkvadnu:03218_0: yadi dṛṣṭānta-prayogaḥ kiṃ ṛjunā eva tat-prayoga-krameṇa
SA15dhkvadnu:03219_0: na prayukto vipratipatti-viṣayaś ca kiṃ na darśita iti cet, na,
SA15dhkvadnu:03221_0: ca. ata eva na pratijñayā hetor bādhanam. na ca ekam
SA15dhkvadnu:03222_0: eva kiṃcin na asti iti bruvāṇaḥ kaścit tat-samuccaya-rūpam
SA15dhkvadnu:03223_0: ekaṃ samūham icchati yena virodhaḥ syāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:03301_0: yo api yugapat ṣaṭkena yogād ity ādinā paramāṇor
SA15dhkvadnu:03302_0: bhedam āha, na tasya apy ekaḥ samuccaya-rūpaḥ sādhayitum
SA15dhkvadnu:03303_0: iṣṭaḥ, kiṃ tarhy abhāva eva eka-aneka-pratiṣedhāt. ataḥ so api
SA15dhkvadnu:03304_0: na samūhas tasya iṣṭaḥ, na tatra śabda iti na virodhaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:03305_0: na virodho ayaṃ pūrvakāt pratijñā-hetu-virodhāt bhidyate
SA15dhkvadnu:03306_0: yena pṛthag ucyeta. tatra hetu-pratijñāyor bādhanam, iha
SA15dhkvadnu:03307_0: pratijñayā hetor ity asti bheda iti cet, artha-virodhe hi hetu-
SA15dhkvadnu:03309_0: dviṣv ity api parasparaṃ bādhakam eka-artha-saṃnidhāv apara-
SA15dhkvadnu:03312_0: api ca ayaṃ viruddho aviruddho vā sati hetu-prayoge vyadhikaraṇatvād
SA15dhkvadnu:03314_0: sa khalu ucyamāna eva atad-dharmatayā pratīto vaktuḥ parājayam
SA15dhkvadnu:03317_0: api ca sarvatra ayaṃ pratijñā-hetvor virodhaḥ sambhavan
SA15dhkvadnu:03318_0: na dvayīṃ hetu-doṣa-jātim atipatati viruddhatām asiddhatāṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:03319_0: ca iti. viruddhatā siddhe hetor dharmiṇi bhāve sādhya-dharma-
SA15dhkvadnu:03402_0: ekatra asambhavāt. na ca anyathā virodhaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:03404_0: virodhād virodha-sambhava iti cet, apramāṇa-yoge tu ubhayor
SA15dhkvadnu:03405_0: dharmiṇi saṃśayaḥ. tathā sati hetor dharmiṇi bhāva-saṃśaye
SA15dhkvadnu:03406_0: asiddhatā eva hetu-doṣa ity asiddha-viruddhābhyām anyo
SA15dhkvadnu:03407_0: na pratijñayā virodho nāma parājaya-hetuḥ. asiddha-viruddhe
SA15dhkvadnu:03408_0: ca hetv-ābhāsa-vacanād eva ukta iti na pṛthak pratijñā-virodho
SA15dhkvadnu:03411_0: cet, syād etat pratijñā-hetvor virodha iti pratijñā-hetū āśritya
SA15dhkvadnu:03412_0: ubhaya-āśrayo bhavati. tatra yadā pratijñā-virodho vivakṣitas
SA15dhkvadnu:03413_0: tadā pratijñā-virodha iti ucyate, yadā pratijñāyā hetor vā
SA15dhkvadnu:03414_0: virodhas tadā viruddho hetur iti. ataḥ pratijñā-virodho hetu-virodho
SA15dhkvadnu:03415_0: vā ity adoṣaḥ. tatra hetor udāharaṇaṃ nityaḥ śabda
SA15dhkvadnu:03416_0: utpatti-dharmakatvād iti, pratijñā-virodhasya na asty ātmā iti,
SA15dhkvadnu:03418_0: ity ādi, pratijñayā hetu-virodha-udāharaṇaṃ na asty eko
SA15dhkvadnu:03421_0: yathoktaṃ prāk. anapekṣe ca kevale svataḥ pratijñā-
SA15dhkvadnu:03422_0: virodhe vivakṣite pratijñā-hetvor virodha iti hetu-grahaṇam
SA15dhkvadnu:03501_0: asambaddham. na ca utpatti-dharmakatvān nityam ity
SA15dhkvadnu:03502_0: atra api hetu-virodho yuktaḥ, pratijñayā hi hetor bādhane
SA15dhkvadnu:03503_0: hetu-virodhaḥ. iha tu hetunā pratijñā bādhyata iti pratijñā-virodho
SA15dhkvadnu:03506_0: yad apy uktam etena pratijñayā dṛṣṭānta-virodha-ādayo api
SA15dhkvadnu:03507_0: vaktavyā bhaṇḍālekhyanyāyena iti tatra api pakṣīkṛta-dharma-
SA15dhkvadnu:03508_0: viparyayavati dṛṣṭānte virodhaḥ syāt. viruddhe ca dṛṣṭānte
SA15dhkvadnu:03510_0: viruddhas tadā hetv-ābhāsaḥ sādhāraṇāyām aprasādhite vā
SA15dhkvadnu:03513_0: kaścid hetu-doṣo dṛṣṭānta-virodhaś ca pratijñayā iti cet, na,
SA15dhkvadnu:03514_0: tad api saṃśaya-hetutva-anativṛtter dṛṣṭānta-virodho hi pratijñāyāḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:03517_0: api hetor na avyabhicāra-dharmatā śakyā darśayitum
SA15dhkvadnu:03519_0: tan na pratijñayā dṛṣṭānta-virodho hetv-ābhāsān ativartate.
SA15dhkvadnu:03601_0: ubhayathā api doṣo astv iti cet, na na hetu-doṣasya prāk
SA15dhkvadnu:03604_0: hetu-lakṣaṇaṃ viruddhe dṛṣṭānte na sambhavati iti prāk
SA15dhkvadnu:03605_0: prayuktasya hetor doṣeṇa parājaya iti na uttara-dṛṣṭānta-apekṣayā
SA15dhkvadnu:03606_0: virodhaś cintām arhati. hetor api dṛṣṭānta-virodhe asādhāraṇatvaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:03607_0: viruddhatvaṃ vā vaidharmye yadi vṛttiḥ syāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:03608_0: pramāṇa-virodhe tu hetoḥ, yathā na dahano agniḥ śaityād
SA15dhkvadnu:03612_0: sarva ete sādhana-virodhā hetv-ābhāseṣv eva antarbhavanti
SA15dhkvadnu:03614_0: yat tu viruddham uttaraṃ para-pakṣe sva-siddhena gotva-ādinā
SA15dhkvadnu:03615_0: anaikāntika-codanā iti, tad asambaddham eva. yadi hi sva-siddhena
SA15dhkvadnu:03617_0: tasya tat sva-pakṣa-viruddhaṃ na abhimatam iti virodha
SA15dhkvadnu:03618_0: yujyeta. sa hi svayaṃ pratipanne gotve hetu-vṛtteḥ saṃśayāno
SA15dhkvadnu:03619_0: apratipattim ātmanas tathā khyāpayati. sa ca hetuḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:03701_0: anaikāntika eva prasādhite tu sāmarthye gotve
SA15dhkvadnu:03702_0: avṛttyā hetor na saṃśaya eva sarva-saṃśaya-prakārāṇāṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:03706_0: saṃśaya-hetum eva āha iti. yat punar uktam ubhaya-pakṣa-sampratipannena
SA15dhkvadnu:03707_0: vastunā anaikāntika-codanā iti, tatra apy avaśyaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:03709_0: asamarthite anyatra api tulyam iti na ubhaya-siddha-itarayor anaikāntikatvair
SA15dhkvadnu:03712_0: tad-abhidhānena eva uktā iti na pṛthag nigrahasthāneṣu uktā iti,
SA15dhkvadnu:03713_0: tad apy avayava-antara-vādino ayuktam. yo avayava-antaraṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:03714_0: dṛṣṭāntaṃ hetor āha, tasya na hetv-ābhāsa-uktyā dṛṣṭānta-ābhāsa-
SA15dhkvadnu:03715_0: uktir vyāpyā tad-vacanena gamyamānasya tasmāt sādhana-antara-
SA15dhkvadnu:03717_0: antarbhāvād dṛṣṭāntasya api hetāv antarbhāva iṣṭo bhavati,
SA15dhkvadnu:03718_0: tathā ca na dṛṣṭāntaḥ pṛthak sādhana-avayavaḥ syād apṛthag-vṛtteḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:03719_0: yo dṛṣṭānta-sādhyo arthas tasya hetāv antarbhāvād
SA15dhkvadnu:03720_0: hetunā eva sādhita iti na dṛṣṭāntasya pṛthak kiṃcit sāmarthyam.
SA15dhkvadnu:03801_0: api ca na kiṃcit pūrva-pakṣa-vādino hetv-ābhāsa-asaṃsparṣe
SA15dhkvadnu:03802_0: nyāyyaṃ nigrahasthānam asti iti tat-sambandhīni sarvāṇy
SA15dhkvadnu:03803_0: eva hetv-ābhāsa-vacanena eva uktāni iti na pṛthag vācyāni
SA15dhkvadnu:03804_0: syuḥ. artha-antara-gamana-āder api hetor asāmarthya eva sambhavāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:03805_0: na hi samarthe hetau sādhye ca siddhe artha-antara-
SA15dhkvadnu:03806_0: gamanaṃ kaścid ārabhate asamarthasya mithyā-pravṛtter iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:03808_0: yaḥ pratijñātam artham anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād
SA15dhkvadnu:03810_0: pratiṣedhe kṛte ka evam āha anityaḥ śabda iti parityajati,
SA15dhkvadnu:03812_0: atra api yady udbhāvite api hetor vyabhicāre na sa pakṣaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:03813_0: parityajati, kiṃ na gṛhyeta. nigṛhīta eva hetv-ābhāsa-abhidhānād
SA15dhkvadnu:03815_0: tasya tad eva adyaṃ nigrahasthānam iti kim anyair
SA15dhkvadnu:03901_0: prapalāyitvaṃ nāma nigrahasthānam ity evam ādy api vācyaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:03902_0: syāt, tasmād etad apy asambaddham iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:03903_0: aviśeṣa-ukte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣam icchato hetv-antaram.
SA15dhkvadnu:03904_0: nidarśanam eka-prakṛti idaṃ vyaktaṃ parimāṇāt, mṛt-pūrvakāṇāṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:03907_0: ca dṛṣṭaṃ parimāṇam iti evaṃ pratyavasthita āha
SA15dhkvadnu:03909_0: duḥkha-moha-samanvitaṃ hi idaṃ sarvaṃ vyaktaṃ parimitaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:04001_0: prakṛtikatvam iti. tad idam aviśeṣa-ukte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:04002_0: bruvato hetv-antaraṃ bhavati. sati ca hetv-antara-bhāve
SA15dhkvadnu:04004_0: atra api pūrvasya eva hetor anaikāntikasya abhidhānān nigṛhīte
SA15dhkvadnu:04006_0: hetum anaikāntikam uktvā datta-uttara-avasaraḥ, tena eva nigṛhyate
SA15dhkvadnu:04011_0: prakṛtyāyāṃ kuryān nityaḥ śabdo asparśatvād iti hetuḥ,
SA15dhkvadnu:04012_0: hetuś ca nāma hinoter dhātos tu-śabde pratyaye kṛd-antaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:04013_0: padam. padaṃ ca nāma-ākhyāta-upasarga-nipātā iti prastutya
SA15dhkvadnu:04014_0: nāma-ādīni vyācaṣṭe, idam artha-antaraṃ nāma nigrahasthānam
SA15dhkvadnu:04101_0: samarthane kartavye tad akṛtvā aparasya prasaṅgena aprasaṅgena
SA15dhkvadnu:04103_0: sthānam uttara-vādino api doṣa-udbhāvana-mātrād aparasya upakṣepa
SA15dhkvadnu:04108_0: idam apy asambaddham, na hi varṇa-krama-nirdeśād eva iṣṭa-
SA15dhkvadnu:04109_0: artha-siddhāv ānarthakyam. yad eva kiṃcid asādhana-aṅgasya
SA15dhkvadnu:04111_0: abhidheyasya abhāvāt niṣprayojanatvāc ca iti, prakāra-viśeṣa-upādānam
SA15dhkvadnu:04113_0: vater upādānād adoṣa iti cet, syād etat, varṇa-krama-nirdeśavad
SA15dhkvadnu:04114_0: iti vatir atra upāttaḥ so anyadā apy ananurūpaṃ gṛhnati ity
SA15dhkvadnu:04115_0: adoṣa iti. na, artha-antara-āder nigrahasthānasya avacana-prasaṅgāt,
SA15dhkvadnu:04116_0: evaṃ hi tā na pṛthag vācyā nirarthakena eva abhidhānāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:04201_0: na sādhya-siddhāv anarthakaṃ nirarthakam, yasya na eva
SA15dhkvadnu:04202_0: kaścid arthaḥ, tan nirarthakam iṣṭam iti cet, yasya kasyacid
SA15dhkvadnu:04203_0: avādino api hi nirarthaka-abhidhāne kiṃ na nigraho nigraha-
SA15dhkvadnu:04205_0: na, tasya iha aprastāvād iti cet, āyātam iha yo nirarthakaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:04206_0: bravīti, tasya tena eva nigraha iti. tat tulyaṃ sarvasya asādhana-
SA15dhkvadnu:04207_0: aṅga-vādina iti. sa sarvo nirarthaka-abhidhāyy anena eva
SA15dhkvadnu:04209_0: na ca varṇa-krama-nirdeśaḥ sarvatra nirarthakaḥ kvacit-
SA15dhkvadnu:04210_0: prakaraṇe tasya api arthavattvāt. tasmād atra eva asya ānarthakyāt
SA15dhkvadnu:04212_0: api ca atyalpam idam ucyate varṇa-krama-nirdeśo nigrahasthānam
SA15dhkvadnu:04216_0: avijñāta-artham. yad vākyaṃ parṣadā prativādinā ca trir-abhihitaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:04218_0: uccāritam ity evam ādinā kāraṇena, tad avijñāta-artham, asāmarthya-
SA15dhkvadnu:04302_0: na idaṃ nirarthakād bhidyate. sa yadi prakṛta-artha-sambaddhaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:04303_0: gamakam eva kuryāt, na asya-asāmarthyam, tatra
SA15dhkvadnu:04304_0: jāḍyāt parṣad-ādayo na pratipadyanta iti na vidvān nigraham
SA15dhkvadnu:04306_0: parṣat-prajñām aparikalpya vacanān nigraha-arha eva iti cet,
SA15dhkvadnu:04307_0: nyāyavādino jāḍyād uktam ajānan kiṃ na prativādī nigṛhyate.
SA15dhkvadnu:04308_0: jāḍyāt parṣad-āder avijñāta-pratipādana-asāmarthya iti vijetā na
SA15dhkvadnu:04310_0: eva iti na pṛthag avijñāta-arthaṃ nāma nigrahasthānam iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:04312_0: anekasya padasya vākyasya vā paurvāparyeṇa yogo
SA15dhkvadnu:04313_0: na asti ity asambaddha-arthatā gṛhyate, tat samudāya-arthasya apāyād
SA15dhkvadnu:04402_0: nirarthakāt pṛthag uktam nanv evam asambaddha-vākyam
SA15dhkvadnu:04403_0: api pṛthag vācyaṃ syāt. na ubhaya-saṃgrahāt apārthakam,
SA15dhkvadnu:04404_0: nirarthakasya api saṃgraha-prasaṅgāt. evaṃvidhāc ca viśeṣa-
SA15dhkvadnu:04406_0: apy uktaḥ. na ca saṃgraha-nirdeśe kiṃcid doṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:04407_0: prabhede vā guṇa-antaram iti yat kiṃcid etat.
SA15dhkvadnu:04409_0: yathālakṣaṇam artha-vaśāt kramaḥ, tatra avayavānāṃ viparyayeṇa
SA15dhkvadnu:04411_0: na, evam api siddher iti cet, na prayoga-apeta-śabda-tulyatvāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:04412_0: yathā gaur ity asya padasya arthe goṇī iti prayujyamānaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:04413_0: padaṃ kakuda-ādimantam arthaṃ pratipādyati iti. na śabda-anvākhyānaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:04414_0: vyartham, anena padena go-śabdam eva pratipadyate,
SA15dhkvadnu:04501_0: ca artham iti, tathā hi pūrvaṃ karma-upādīyate tataḥ karaṇaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:04503_0: tad etad unmattasya unmatta-saṃvarṇanam iva prayoga-apeta-
SA15dhkvadnu:04504_0: śabda-vad etad iti. yadi goṇī-śabdāt kakuda-ādimaty
SA15dhkvadnu:04505_0: arthe pratītiḥ, śabda-anvākhyāna-prayatnena arthaṃ na paśyāmaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:04508_0: vyutpatty-artham anvākhyānam iti cet, nanu goṇī-śabdād api
SA15dhkvadnu:04509_0: loke pratītir dṛṣṭā. satyaṃ dṛṣṭā, na tu sākṣād ity uktam.
SA15dhkvadnu:04510_0: uktam etan na punar yuktam, strī-śūdrāṇām ubhaya-pratīter
SA15dhkvadnu:04511_0: abhāvāt. yaḥ khalu ubhayaṃ vetti śabdam apaśabdaṃ ca, sa
SA15dhkvadnu:04512_0: evaṃ pratipadyate. yas tu nakka-śabdaṃ mukka-śabdam eva
SA15dhkvadnu:04513_0: vā vetti, na nāsā-śabdam, sa katham apaśabdāc śabdaṃ pratipadya
SA15dhkvadnu:04514_0: tato arthaṃ pratipadyeta. dṛṣṭā ca anubhaya-vedino api
SA15dhkvadnu:04516_0: arthe asamarthasya śabde api pratīti-janana-asāmarthyāc ca.
SA15dhkvadnu:04517_0: na hy arthe api vācakatvaṃ nāma anyad eva tad-viṣaya-pratīti-
SA15dhkvadnu:04518_0: jananāt. apaśabdaś cec śabde pratītiṃ janayet, artha eva
SA15dhkvadnu:04519_0: kiṃ na janayati. na hy etasya arthāt kiṃcid bhayaṃ paśyāmo
SA15dhkvadnu:04601_0: akṛta-samayasya śabde apy apratīti-jananāc ca. na hy
SA15dhkvadnu:04602_0: ayam apaśabdaḥ śabde api svabhāvataḥ pratītiṃ janayaty
SA15dhkvadnu:04603_0: adarśanāt, samayata eva tu janayet. samaya-vaśād vartamāno
SA15dhkvadnu:04604_0: artha eva kiṃ na pravartate. evaṃ hi pratipatti-paraṃparā-
SA15dhkvadnu:04607_0: apaśabdair eva bahulaṃ vyutpadyamānā loke dṛśyante
SA15dhkvadnu:04610_0: ko ayaṃ śabdānāṃ saṃskāraḥ. na hy eṣāṃ prajñā-bāhu-śruty-
SA15dhkvadnu:04611_0: ādikaṃ saṃskāraṃ paśyāmaḥ, na apy eṣām ekāntena
SA15dhkvadnu:04612_0: śravyatā, na apy artha-pratyāyane kaścid atiśayaḥ. na
SA15dhkvadnu:04614_0: apy adharma-utpatteḥ, anyebhyo api viparyaye dharma-utpatteḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:04616_0: na ca evaṃvidhān āgamān ādriyante yuktijñāḥ. na ca
SA15dhkvadnu:04618_0: naraka-pātam iti bruvāṇasya kasyacin mukhaṃ vakrībhavati.
SA15dhkvadnu:04619_0: tasmān na saṃskṛto nāma kaścic śabdaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:04701_0: śiṣṭa-prayogaḥ saṃskāra iti cet, ke śiṣṭāḥ. ye vidita-vedyatā-
SA15dhkvadnu:04702_0: ādi-guṇa-yuktāḥ. kaḥ punar eṣāṃ guṇa-utkarṣa-anapekṣo alīka-nirbandhaḥ,
SA15dhkvadnu:04703_0: yat te amūn eva śabdān prayuñjate, na aparān. na
SA15dhkvadnu:04704_0: ca atra kaścic śabde parokṣaḥ sākṣī, yata idam evaṃ niścinumaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:04705_0: prayuñjate nāma śiṣṭāḥ. nanv evaṃ vayaṃ guṇa-atiśayam
SA15dhkvadnu:04709_0: saty api guṇa atiśaye na karaṇīya eva anvākhyāne yatnaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:04712_0: kiṃcil lakṣaṇam asti, atha ca sampradāya-vaśāt tā lokas
SA15dhkvadnu:04713_0: tathā eva pratipadyate tāsāṃ ca prayoga-bhraṃśam tathā
SA15dhkvadnu:04714_0: saṃskṛtānāṃ śabdānāṃ pratītir bhaviṣyati iti. jaḍa-pravṛttir
SA15dhkvadnu:04715_0: eva eṣā, yā śabdānāṃ lakṣaṇe pravṛttiḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:04801_0: avayava-viparyaye api yadi teṣāṃ vacanānāṃ sambandha-pratītir, na
SA15dhkvadnu:04802_0: viparyayo na apy artha-apratītiḥ sāmarthyāt. na hy atra kaścit
SA15dhkvadnu:04803_0: samayaḥ pratyāyana-aviśeṣe apy evam eva avayavāḥ prayoktavyā
SA15dhkvadnu:04805_0: sa eva teṣāṃ kramo yathāvasthitebhyo artha-pratītir bhavati iti
SA15dhkvadnu:04806_0: na viparyayāt pratītiḥ, tata ānupūrvī-pratipattyā pratītir
SA15dhkvadnu:04808_0: yeṣāṃ śabdānāṃ kaścit sambandho jāyate, idam iha
SA15dhkvadnu:04809_0: sambadhyata iti teṣu vidita-sambandheṣu kaḥ kasya pūrvo
SA15dhkvadnu:04810_0: aparo vā kramaḥ, yena krameṇa vyavasthāpyeran. sambandha-
SA15dhkvadnu:04811_0: pratipattau sa eva teṣāṃ kramaḥ, yo yathāvasthitānāṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:04812_0: sambandhaḥ pratīyate. na hi vākyeṣu padānāṃ krama-niyamaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:04813_0: kaścit, yathā rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ, puruṣo rajña iti. yāvadbhiḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:04814_0: padair artha-parisamāptiḥ tadā ekaṃ vākyam, yathā
SA15dhkvadnu:04815_0: devadatta gām ānaya kṛṣṇām iti. atra padānāṃ yathākāmaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:04816_0: prayoge api na artha-pratītau viśeṣa iti kaścit krama-abhiniveśaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:04819_0: pratītir bhaviṣyati iti pratīyamāna-arthasya ca śabdasya prayoge
SA15dhkvadnu:04901_0: dharmiṇi bhāvaḥ pradarśyeta, dharmiṇi bhāvaṃ pradarśya
SA15dhkvadnu:04902_0: sambandhaḥ pradarśyeta iti na niyamaḥ kaścid ubhayathā api
SA15dhkvadnu:04903_0: pratīty-utpatter ity uktam. apratīyamāna-sambandheṣu ca padeṣu
SA15dhkvadnu:04904_0: na tebhya ānupūrvyā api pratītir iti na idam apārthakād
SA15dhkvadnu:04905_0: bhidyata iti; na aprāptakālaṃ pṛthag vācyaṃ syād iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:04906_0: hīnam anyatamena apy avayavena nyūnam. yasmin vākye
SA15dhkvadnu:04907_0: pratijñā-ādīnām anyatamo avayavo na bhavati, tad vākyaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:04909_0: na pratijñā-nyūnaṃ hīnaṃ tad-abhāve pratīti-bhāvād iti
SA15dhkvadnu:04910_0: pratipāditam. hīnam eva tat nyūnatāyām api nigrahād ity
SA15dhkvadnu:04911_0: aparaḥ. yaḥ pratīyamāna-artham anarthakaṃ śabdaṃ prayuṅkte,
SA15dhkvadnu:04912_0: sa nigraham arhet. na artha-upasaṃhitasya abhidhātā ity
SA15dhkvadnu:04913_0: asamīkṣita-abhidhānam etat. ata eva ca pratijñāyā na sādhana-
SA15dhkvadnu:04916_0: ānarthakyam iti tad etan niyama-abhyupagame veditavyam.
SA15dhkvadnu:04920_0: tu na kaścid doṣo niyama-abhāvād iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:05002_0: śabda-punaruktam anityaḥ śabdo anityaḥ śabda iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:05005_0: atra na śabda-punaruktaṃ pṛthag vācyam artha-punarukta-
SA15dhkvadnu:05006_0: vacanena eva gatatvāt. na hy artha-bhede śabda-sāmye api
SA15dhkvadnu:05008_0: hasati hasati svāminy uccai rudaty atiroditi /
SA15dhkvadnu:05012_0: yathā vā yad yasmin bhavati bhavati, na bhavati na bhavati,
SA15dhkvadnu:05013_0: tat tasya kāryam, itarat kāraṇam iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:05016_0: artha-punaruktena eva gata-arthatvāt na pṛthag vācyam. ayam
SA15dhkvadnu:05017_0: api niyata-sādhana vākya eva doṣo vaktavyaḥ, na vistara-kathāyām,
SA15dhkvadnu:05019_0: śaṅkayā sākṣi-prabhṛtīnāṃ punaḥ punar brūyāt, api na tatra
SA15dhkvadnu:05021_0: na aviṣayatvād iti cet, na ayaṃ gurur na śiṣya iti na yatnataḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:05101_0: pratipādaniyaḥ, yena punaḥ punar ucyata iti punarvacane
SA15dhkvadnu:05102_0: nigraha eva iti cet, na, sākṣiṇāṃ yatnena pratipādyatvāt,
SA15dhkvadnu:05106_0: na ca idam adhikād bhidyata iti na pṛthag vācyam. viniyata-
SA15dhkvadnu:05107_0: pada-prayoge hi sādhana-vākye ādhikya-doṣa iti punarvacane
SA15dhkvadnu:05113_0: doṣa iti ādhikya-punarvacanayos tulya-doṣa iti saṃgraha-
SA15dhkvadnu:05114_0: vacanaṃ nyāyyam, doṣa-abhāvād eva guṇa-abhāvāt, evaṃprakārānāṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:05115_0: bhedānāṃ vacane ca atiprasaṅgād ity uktam.
SA15dhkvadnu:05116_0: paryāya-śabda-kalpo hy aparo hetur eka-hetu-pratipādite viṣaye
SA15dhkvadnu:05201_0: yat punar uktam, anuvāde tv apunaruktaṃ śabda-abhyāsād
SA15dhkvadnu:05203_0: punarvacanaṃ nigamanam iti, pratijñāyā eva gamyamāna-arthāyā
SA15dhkvadnu:05204_0: vacanaṃ punarvacanam, kiṃ punar asyāḥ punarvacanam
SA15dhkvadnu:05211_0: uttareṇa avasānān na idaṃ nigrahasthānam iti cet, syād
SA15dhkvadnu:05212_0: etat, uttareṇa guṇa-doṣavatā mūḍha-amūḍhatvaṃ gamyata iti
SA15dhkvadnu:05213_0: kiṃ punar-uccāritena. asti hi kaścid uttare samartho na pratyuccāraṇe,
SA15dhkvadnu:05214_0: na asau tāvatā nigraham arhed iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:05215_0: na, uttara-viṣaya-aparijñānāt. yady ayaṃ na pratyuccārayati,
SA15dhkvadnu:05216_0: nirviṣayam uttaraṃ prasajyeta. atha uttaraṃ bravīti,
SA15dhkvadnu:05217_0: kathaṃ na uccārayati. tad idaṃ vyāhatam ucyate, na uccārayaty
SA15dhkvadnu:05301_0: uttaraṃ ca bravīti iti. apratijñānāc ca. na ca idaṃ pratijñāyate,
SA15dhkvadnu:05303_0: abhidhātavyam iti, api tu yathākathaṃcid uttaraṃ vācyam,
SA15dhkvadnu:05304_0: uttaraṃ ca āśraya-abhāve ayuktam iti, yuktam apratyuccāraṇaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:05309_0: arthān upakṣipya kathāṃ vistārayet, tac ca sarvaṃ yadā
SA15dhkvadnu:05310_0: na anuvaktuṃ śaknuyāt, kas tasya vivāda-āśraya-artha-mātra-uttara-
SA15dhkvadnu:05316_0: upakṣepaḥ, tad avaśyaṃ sādhana-aṅga-viṣayatvād dūṣaṇena upadarśyata
SA15dhkvadnu:05317_0: eva. tatra api na sarvaṃ prāg anukrameṇa uccāritavyam,
SA15dhkvadnu:05318_0: paścād dūṣaṇaṃ vācyaṃ dvir uccāraṇa-prasaṅgāt. dūṣaṇa-
SA15dhkvadnu:05402_0: ghoṣaṇaṃ vyartham iti, na kāryam eva dūṣayatā asya ayaṃ doṣa
SA15dhkvadnu:05404_0: kriyata eva. na hi sarva-viṣaya-upadarśanaṃ kṛtvā yugapad
SA15dhkvadnu:05405_0: doṣaḥ śakyate abhidhātum, pratyarthaṃ doṣa-bhedāt. tasmād
SA15dhkvadnu:05406_0: yaṃ padārthaṃ dūṣayati, sa eva tad-dūṣaṇa-viṣayas tadā
SA15dhkvadnu:05407_0: pradarśanīyo na aparaḥ, tad-dūṣaṇe apara-upadarśanasya asambhavāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:05408_0: tasmin dūṣite punar anyo artho apara-doṣa-viṣaya ity
SA15dhkvadnu:05409_0: ayam anubhāṣaṇe dūṣaṇe ca nyāyaḥ. sakṛt-sarva-anubhāṣaṇe
SA15dhkvadnu:05410_0: api doṣa-vacana-kāle punar viṣayaḥ pradarśanīya eva, apradarśite
SA15dhkvadnu:05411_0: doṣasya vaktum aśakyatvāt. tathā ca dvir-anubhāṣaṇaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:05412_0: kṛtaṃ syāt. tatra prathamaṃ sarva-anukrama-anubhāṣaṇaṃ niṣprayojanam.
SA15dhkvadnu:05413_0: dūṣaṇa-vādinā dūṣaṇe vaktavye yan na tatra upayujyate,
SA15dhkvadnu:05414_0: tasya abhidhānam adoṣa-udbhāvanaṃ dvir-uktiś ca iti
SA15dhkvadnu:05416_0: tathā astv iti cet, syād etat, uktaṃ etad artha-antaraṃ nigrahasthānam
SA15dhkvadnu:05417_0: iti. tatra sādhane yataḥ kutaścit prasaṅga-ādinā
SA15dhkvadnu:05420_0: na prasajyate. na api tat tasya anubhāṣaṇīyam, na ca idam apy
SA15dhkvadnu:05421_0: asmābhir anujñāyate, sarvaṃ prāk sakṛd vaktavyaṃ paścād
SA15dhkvadnu:05422_0: dūṣaṇam iti, kiṃ tu dūṣayatā avaśyaṃ viṣayo darśanīyo
SA15dhkvadnu:05501_0: evaṃ tarhi na ananubhāṣaṇaṃ pṛthag nigrahasthānaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:05502_0: vācyam apratibhayā gatatvāt, uttarasya hy apratipattir
SA15dhkvadnu:05503_0: apratibhā. na ca uttara-viṣayam apradarśayann uttaraṃ pratipattuṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:05507_0: eva, gavi vihitam iva sāsnā-ādimattvaṃ bāhuleye api. tasmād
SA15dhkvadnu:05508_0: apratibhā eva nigraha-adhikaraṇatvena vācyā, na ananubhāṣaṇam.
SA15dhkvadnu:05510_0: kaś ca ayaṃ samaya-niyamas trir-abhihitasya ananubhāṣaṇam
SA15dhkvadnu:05511_0: iti. yadi tāvat para-pratipādana-arthā pravṛttiḥ, kiṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:05512_0: trir abhidhīyeta. tathā tathā sa grāhaṇīyaḥ, yathā asya pratipattir
SA15dhkvadnu:05513_0: bhavati. atha para-upatāpana-arthā, tadā api kiṃ trir
SA15dhkvadnu:05514_0: abhidhīyate, sākṣiṇāṃ karṇe nivedya prativādī kaṣṭa-pratīta-
SA15dhkvadnu:05601_0: vimūḍhas tūṣṇīṃbhavati. na hi para-upatāpana-krame kaścin
SA15dhkvadnu:05603_0: trir-abhidhānaṃ vā vidhīyate. na ca para-upatāpāya santaḥ pravartante
SA15dhkvadnu:05604_0: śāstrāṇi vā praṇīyante ity ado vaktavyam. tasmāt
SA15dhkvadnu:05605_0: tāvad vaktavyam, yāvad anena na gṛhītam, na trir eva. agrahaṇa-
SA15dhkvadnu:05608_0: avijñātaṃ ca ajñānam. vijñātaṃ parṣadā prativādinā yad
SA15dhkvadnu:05609_0: avijñātam, tad ajñānaṃ nāma nigrahasthānam. arthe khalv
SA15dhkvadnu:05610_0: avijñāte na tasya pratiṣedhaṃ brūyād iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:05611_0: etad apy ananubhāṣaṇa-vad apratibhayā eva gamyatvād
SA15dhkvadnu:05613_0: pratipattir aśakyā iti anuttara-pratipattyā eva nigrahasthānatvam
SA15dhkvadnu:05701_0: ca uttaraṃ brūyād iti viṣaya-ajñānam uttara-jñānaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:05703_0: artho hi na anubhāṣet. ananubhāṣamāṇo viṣayam
SA15dhkvadnu:05704_0: apradarśya-uttaraṃ pratipattuṃ na śaknuyād iti uttaraṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:05707_0: tad-abhāve pratipattir bhavaty eva iti tayoḥ pṛthag vacane
SA15dhkvadnu:05708_0: apratibhāyāḥ ko viṣaya iti vaktavyam, nirviṣayatvād avācyā
SA15dhkvadnu:05710_0: na uttara-ajñānam ajñānaṃ kiṃ tarhi viṣaya-ajñānam, ajñāte
SA15dhkvadnu:05711_0: hi viṣaye uttara-ajñānāt tan na pratipadyeta iti asti viṣayo apratibhāyā
SA15dhkvadnu:05712_0: iti cet, evaṃ tarhy ananubhāṣaṇaṃ nirviṣayam,
SA15dhkvadnu:05713_0: ajñānena ākṣepāt. na hi viṣayaṃ samyak pratipadyamānaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:05714_0: kaścin na anubhāṣeta iti na ananubhāṣaṇaṃ pṛthag vācyam.
SA15dhkvadnu:05715_0: uttara-ajñānasya ca ākṣepāt. viṣaya-ajñānena uttara-ajñānam apy
SA15dhkvadnu:05716_0: ākṣiptam eva. na hi viṣayam ajānann uttaraṃ jānāti iti na eva apratibhāyā
SA15dhkvadnu:05801_0: jñāte api viṣaye punar uttara-ajñānam apratibhāyā viṣaya
SA15dhkvadnu:05802_0: iti cet, evaṃ tarhi viṣaya-uttara-ajñānayor api prabhedān nigrahasthāna-
SA15dhkvadnu:05803_0: antarāṇi vācyāni. yathā ajñānasya viṣaya-ajñānam uttara-
SA15dhkvadnu:05804_0: ajñānam iti prabhedād asaty api guṇa-atiśaye nigrahasthāna-
SA15dhkvadnu:05805_0: antara-vyavasthā kriyate, tathā ajñānayor api sarvā-jñāna-ardha-
SA15dhkvadnu:05806_0: ajñānam ity ādi-prabhedān nigrahasthāna-antarāṇi kiṃ na ucyante.
SA15dhkvadnu:05807_0: na ca ubhayasya apy ajñānasya saṃgraha-vacane kaścid
SA15dhkvadnu:05808_0: doṣaḥ, guṇas tu syād iti saṃgraha-vacanaṃ nyāyyam.
SA15dhkvadnu:05810_0: pṛthag-vacanam. api ca na pūrva-uttara-vādino hetv-ābhāsā-pratibhābhyām
SA15dhkvadnu:05812_0: vacanena eva sarvam uktam iti. tad-ubhaya-ākṣipteṣu prabhedeṣu
SA15dhkvadnu:05816_0: uttaraṃ yadā na pratipadyate, tadā nigṛhīto vaktavyaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:05901_0: kārya-vyāsaṅgāt kathā-vicchedo vikṣepaḥ. yat kiṃcit kartavyaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:05902_0: vyāsajya kathāṃ vicchinatti, idaṃ me karaṇīyaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:05903_0: parihīyate, asminn avasite paścāt kariṣyāmi, pratiśyāyakalā
SA15dhkvadnu:05904_0: me kaṇṭhaṃ kṣiṇoty evam-ādinā kathāṃ vicchinatti, sa vikṣepo
SA15dhkvadnu:05907_0: idam apy yadi pūrvapakṣa-vādī kuryād vyāja-upakṣepa-mātreṇa,
SA15dhkvadnu:05910_0: vikṣepaḥ syāt. tathā ca idam artha-antara-gamana eva antarbhaved
SA15dhkvadnu:05913_0: na bhidyate. atiprasaṅgaś ca evaṃprakārāṇām asambaddha-
SA15dhkvadnu:06002_0: vyavasthāpane proktaḥ. atha uttarapakṣa-vādy evaṃ vikṣipet,
SA15dhkvadnu:06003_0: tasya api sādhana-anantaram uttare pratipattavye tad-apratipattyā
SA15dhkvadnu:06006_0: nanu na avaśyaṃ sādhana-dūṣaṇābhyām eva sarvasya pratipattir,
SA15dhkvadnu:06008_0: hetv-ābhāseṣv apratibhāyāṃ vā antarbhavet. bhavati hi anibaddhena
SA15dhkvadnu:06009_0: api kathā-prapañcena vivāda iti, na, asambhavāt.
SA15dhkvadnu:06010_0: ekatra adhikaraṇe viruddha-abhyupagamayor vivādaḥ syāt, aviruddha-
SA15dhkvadnu:06016_0: anyathā pareṣām apratipatteḥ, apareṇa ca tat-sambandhi dūṣaṇam.
SA15dhkvadnu:06101_0: dvayaṃ na atipatati. etena eva vitaṇḍā pratyukta-abhyupagama-
SA15dhkvadnu:06103_0: yadā tarhy abhyupagamya vādaṃ viphalatayā na kiṃcid
SA15dhkvadnu:06104_0: vakti, anyad vā yat kiṃcit pralapati, tadā kathaṃ hetv-ābhāsa-
SA15dhkvadnu:06106_0: anabhidhāna anya-abhidhānayor api parājaya eva ity uktam
SA15dhkvadnu:06108_0: punaruktasya ca pratijñā-āder vacanasya ca nigrahasthānatvaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:06114_0: yaḥ pareṇa coditaṃ doṣam anuddhṛtya, bhavato
SA15dhkvadnu:06115_0: apy ayaṃ doṣa iti bravīti, yathā bhavāṃś cauraḥ puruṣatvād
SA15dhkvadnu:06116_0: ity ukte sa taṃ pratibrūyād, bhavān api iti, sa sva-pakṣe doṣa-abhyupagamāt
SA15dhkvadnu:06201_0: atra api yadi puruṣatvāc cauro bhavān api syāt, na ca bhavatā
SA15dhkvadnu:06202_0: ātmā evam iṣṭaḥ, tasmān na ayaṃ caurya-hetur iti yady
SA15dhkvadnu:06203_0: ayam abhiprāyaḥ, tadā na kaścid doṣaḥ, anabhimate tad-ātmani
SA15dhkvadnu:06205_0: prasaṅgam antareṇa āñjasena eva kiṃ na vyabhicārita iti
SA15dhkvadnu:06206_0: cet, yat kiṃcid etat, santi hy evaṃprakārā api vyavahārā loka
SA15dhkvadnu:06207_0: iti. atha tad upakṣepam abhyupagacchaty eva, tadā apy
SA15dhkvadnu:06208_0: asāv uttara-apratipattyā eva tat-sādhane nigraha-arhaḥ, na aparatra
SA15dhkvadnu:06210_0: eva uttara-apratipattir iti tāvatā eva pūrvam āpanna-nigrahasya
SA15dhkvadnu:06214_0: nigraha-prāpto asi ity ananuyogaḥ. etac ca kasya parājaya
SA15dhkvadnu:06215_0: ity anuyuktayā parṣadā vaktavyam, na khalu nigraha-prāptaḥ
SA15dhkvadnu:06301_0: atra api yadi sādhana-vādinaṃ nigraha-prāptam uttara-vādī
SA15dhkvadnu:06302_0: na paryanuyuṅkte, apratibhā eva asya uttara-apratipatter iti na
SA15dhkvadnu:06304_0: punar na dvayor ekasya api atra jaya-parājayau, sādhana-
SA15dhkvadnu:06306_0: atha kaṃcid doṣam udbhāvayati, kaṃcin na, na tadā
SA15dhkvadnu:06308_0: arhati eva, sarvasya sato doṣasya anudbhāvanād iti cet, na
SA15dhkvadnu:06309_0: santa iti kṛtvā sarve doṣā avaśyaṃ vaktavyā avacane vā
SA15dhkvadnu:06311_0: yathā ekasya artha-asya aneka-sādhana-sadbhāve apy ekena eva
SA15dhkvadnu:06312_0: tat-siddher na sarva-upādānam iti na doṣam udbhāvayann eva aparasya
SA15dhkvadnu:06402_0: na nigṛhṇāti, tadā tayor nyāyena na ekasya api pūrvavaj
SA15dhkvadnu:06407_0: evam api na paryanuyojya-upekṣaṇaṃ nāma parājaya-adhikaraṇam
SA15dhkvadnu:06411_0: asi iti bruvan niranuyojya-anuyogān nigṛhīto vaktavyaḥ.
SA15dhkvadnu:06412_0: atra api yadi tat-sādhana-vādinam abhūtair doṣair uttara-
SA15dhkvadnu:06413_0: vādy abhiyuñjīta, so asthāne nirdoṣe nigrahasthānasya abhiyokta-
SA15dhkvadnu:06414_0: udbhāvayitā na bhavati. tathā ca bhūta-doṣa-udbhāvana-lakṣaṇasya
SA15dhkvadnu:06501_0: apratibhayā eva nigṛhīta iti na idam ato nigrahasthāna-antaram.
SA15dhkvadnu:06504_0: aparo doṣa-ābhāsa-vacanena abhiyuñjīta, tasya tena bhūta-
SA15dhkvadnu:06505_0: doṣatve pratipādite sādhana-ābhāsa-vacanena eva nigṛhīta iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:06506_0: evam api na idaṃ hetv-ābhāsebhyo bhidyate. avaśyaṃ hi
SA15dhkvadnu:06512_0: vijñeyaḥ. yathā na sato vināśaḥ, na asad utpadyata iti siddhāntam
SA15dhkvadnu:06515_0: ādīnāṃ dṛṣṭam eka-prakṛtikatvam, tathā ca ayaṃ vyakta-
SA15dhkvadnu:06602_0: eka-prakṛtir iti. sa evam uktavān paryanuyujyate.
SA15dhkvadnu:06603_0: atha prakṛtir vikāra iti kathaṃ lakṣayitavyam iti. yasya avasthitasya
SA15dhkvadnu:06605_0: sā prakṛtiḥ. yat tad dharma-antaram, sa vikāra iti. so ayaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:06607_0: khalv anena na asad āvirbhavati, na sat tirobhavati iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:06608_0: sad-asatoś ca tirobhāva-āvirbhāvāv antareṇa na kasyacit pravṛtty-
SA15dhkvadnu:06609_0: uparamaḥ pravṛttir vā iti evaṃ pratyavasthito yadi sata
SA15dhkvadnu:06610_0: ātma-hānam asataś ca ātma-lābham abhyupaiti, apasiddhānto
SA15dhkvadnu:06611_0: bhavati atha na abhyupaiti, pakṣo asya na sidhyati iti.
SA15dhkvadnu:06612_0: iha api na kaścid aniyamāt kathā-prasaṅgaḥ yat tena upagatan
SA15dhkvadnu:06613_0: na asad utpadyate, na sad vinaśyati iti tasya samarthanāya
SA15dhkvadnu:06614_0: idam uktam eka-prakṛtikam idaṃ vyaktam anvaya-darśanād
SA15dhkvadnu:06615_0: iti. tatra ekā prakṛtiḥ sukha-duḥkha-mohaḥ. tad-avibhakta-
SA15dhkvadnu:06703_0: vināśāv iti siddhaṃ bhavati. atra tad-uktasya hetor doṣam
SA15dhkvadnu:06706_0: tatra idaṃ syād vācyam, vyaktaṃ nāma pravṛtti-nivṛtti-
SA15dhkvadnu:06707_0: dharmakam, na tathā sukha-ādayaḥ. vyaktasya sukha-ādy-anvaye
SA15dhkvadnu:06709_0: virodhād iti. sukha-ādy-anvaya-darśanād ity asiddho hetur
SA15dhkvadnu:06711_0: iti. evaṃ hi tasya sādhana-doṣa-udbhāvanena pakṣo dūṣito
SA15dhkvadnu:06712_0: bhavati. so anupasaṃhṛtya sādhana-doṣaṃ kathāṃ pratānayan
SA15dhkvadnu:06714_0: ayam eva doṣo anena prakaraṇena ucyata iti cet, eṣa naimittikāṇāṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:06715_0: viṣayaḥ, na lokaḥ śabdair apratipāditam arthaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:06716_0: pratipattuṃ samartha iti. sa eva ayaṃ bhaṇḍālekhyanyāyo
SA15dhkvadnu:06717_0: atra api. yathoktena nyāyena pūrvakasya asādhana-aṅgasya asiddhasya
SA15dhkvadnu:06718_0: hetor abhidhānād eva nigrahaḥ, na api aniyamāt
SA15dhkvadnu:06719_0: kathā-prasaṅgād iti. idam api hetv-ābhāseṣv antarbhāvān na
SA15dhkvadnu:06801_0: hetv-ābhāsāś ca yathoktāḥ. hetv-ābhāsāś ca nigrahasthānāni.
SA15dhkvadnu:06804_0: ity ata āha yathokta-hetv-ābhāsa-lakṣaṇena eva nigrahasthāna-
SA15dhkvadnu:06806_0: atra api yathoktaṃ kṛtvā cintyam eva, kiṃ te yathālakṣita-prabhedās
SA15dhkvadnu:06807_0: tathā eva, āhosvid anyathā iti. tat tu cintyamānam
SA15dhkvadnu:06808_0: iha atiprasajyata iti na pratanyate. hetv-ābhāsāś ca yathānyāyaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:06812_0: tattva-ālokaṃ timirayati taṃ durvidagdho jano ayaṃ
SA15dhkvadnu:06813_0: tasmād yatnaḥ kṛta iha mayā tat-samujjvālanāya //3//
